title: East India Cotton association Prices - October 09 2019
text:
East India Cotton association Prices - October 09 2019

Commodities 2 hours ago (Oct 09, 2019 22:41)

© Reuters. East India Cotton association Prices - October 09 2019 BANGALORE, October 09(Reuters) - The following are the daily Cotton prices supplied by Indian based East India Cotton Association. The prices are in Indian Rupees per Candy (355.62 Kgs).
